newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Karachi port handles 47,370 tonnes cargo.
newsitem.headline: Karachi port handles 47,370 tonnes cargo.

text.p: Pakistan's Karachi Port Trust said it had handled 47,370 tonnes of export and import cargo in the 24 hours to 7 a.m. (0200 GMT) on Saturday compared to 57,907 tonnes in the same period on Thursday.
In the past 24 hours, one ship sailed and seven berthed. In the next 24 hours, eight are expected to sail and seven are expected to arrive.
Berthing schedule of major vessels unloading or expected to unload at Karachi Port:
